response.overview: Octavio, a hermit, has premonitions about an environmental disaster that will destroy the city where his brother Cassiel and his family live. na wan After being branded as unbalanced for alerting people some time ago, he contacts Cassiel to take care of him for a pneumonia invented as an excuse for his visit. Octavio does everything possible to stay with him and save him from catastrophe.
